msItem.title: Risalah-i Jihad.
msItem.note: F1a. Signature of David Price. Includes a number of poems in some kind of Urdu (?). Written on the instructions of Tipu Sultan.
msItem.incipit: Fath-i mulk-i sukhanwari wa taskhir-i iqlim-i ma'nawi A treatise on the art of war. Apparently a version of the work known as the Fath al-Mujahidin, which has the same incipit. This title is not given in the preface to this manuscript.

listBibl.bibl: Storey, ii, pp. 425, 426. Cf. i, p. 773.
Price's bequest is noted in the Journal for 1836, pp. xii-xiv (an obituary notice p. lx).

bindingDesc.p: Brown morocco Indian binding with flap and painted and coloured stamped decoration.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org

list.item: The Art of War, military tactics etc.
